description: This is a market on whether 19 states will have high or substantial COVID-19 community spread on any day on or after the inception date of this market, July 9, 2021, and on or before July 30, 2021. This market will resolve to “Yes” if 19 states have high or substantial community spread on any day on or after July 9 and on or before July 30, 2021, and “No” otherwise. The resolution source is https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#cases_community with “Level of Community Transmission” selected. The resolution source will be checked every day at 8 PM ET, and the number of states with high or substantial community spread will calculated. If on any of these checks the number is 19 or higher, the market will resolve to “Yes.” The final check will be on July 30, 2021, at 8 PM ET. If the resolution source is down or data is unavailable, then the market will resolve based on the most recently available data. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

events.title: Will 19 states have high or substantial COVID-19 community spread on any day on or before July 30?

question: Will 19 states have high or substantial COVID-19 community spread on any day on or before July 30?
